achievement.name: Taskmaster
achievement.desc: Complete 5 Missions

achievement.name: Veteran
achievement.desc: Complete 10 Missions

achievement.name: Honorable Commander
achievement.desc: Complete 20 Missions

achievement.name: Completionist
achievement.desc: Complete 50 Missions

achievement.name: Prestigious Leader
achievement.desc: Complete 100 Missions

achievement.name: Conquerer
achievement.desc: Complete 500 Missions

achievement.name: Supreme Warlord
achievement.desc: Complete 1000 Missions

achievement.name: Fighter
achievement.desc: Participate in 5 Live Battles (Arena or Tournaments)

achievement.name: Battle Veteran
achievement.desc: Participate in 25 Live Battles (Arena or Tournaments)

achievement.name: Champion
achievement.desc: Participate in 50 Live Battles (Arena or Tournaments)

achievement.name: Destroyer
achievement.desc: Participate in 100 Live Battles (Arena or Tournaments)

achievement.name: Warlord
achievement.desc: Participate in 500 Live Battles (Arena or Tournaments)

achievement.name: Emperor
achievement.desc: Participate in 1000 Live Battles (Arena or Tournaments)

achievement.name: Battlemaster
achievement.desc: Kill at least 5 Assault units in a mission and win

achievement.name: Super Structure
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after you played at least 5 Structures in the battle

achievement.name: Battle Medic
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher with at least 3 Medics played in the battle

achievement.name: Air Raid
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after using Strike at least 5 times in the battle

achievement.name: Sky Control
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after killing at least 3 units with Flying

achievement.name: Brute Strength
achievement.desc: Win 10 missions using only the basic attack (No skills can activate)

achievement.name: Skill Connoisseur
achievement.desc: Win a mission using Strike, Heal, Jam, Rally, and Weaken

achievement.name: Standard Conqueror
achievement.desc: Complete all missions associated with the Standard set (through Mission 28)

achievement.name: Typhon's Conqueror
achievement.desc: Complete all missions associated with the Enclave set (through Mission 41)

achievement.name: Bloodthirsty Companion
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after using Leech and Siphon

achievement.name: Defensive Minded
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after using Counter and Regenerate

achievement.name: Xeno Sympathizer
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 41 or higher after using Mimic, Immobilize, and Fear

achievement.name: Spare the Troops
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission without killing an Assault card

achievement.name: Limited Support
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission playing only 1 Assault card

achievement.name: Full Circle
achievement.desc: Play the card "Infantry" during Mission 28 and win

achievement.name: Supply Lines
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after using Heal at least 5 times in the battle

achievement.name: Encouraging War Cry
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after using Rally at least 5 times in the battle

achievement.name: Demolition
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after destroying at least 2 structures

achievement.name: Copycat
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 41 or higher after using Mimic at least 5 times

achievement.name: Front-Line Pressure
achievement.desc: Defeat 10 Missions attacking at least 25 times in each battle

achievement.name: Lucky Streak
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher after activating Jam at least 5 times

achievement.name: Deny Support
achievement.desc: Play at least 2 Medics in Mission 24 or higher, and win without using Heal, Leech, Siphon, or Regenerate

achievement.name: Action Hero
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 41 or higher after playing at least 3 Action Cards

achievement.name: Speedy Wastelands
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 41 by turn 9

achievement.name: Speedy Red Sands
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 35 by turn 13

achievement.name: Speedy Swamps
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 28 by turn 15

achievement.name: Speedy Blackmarsh
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 23 by turn 15

achievement.name: Speedy Cyprion
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 17 by turn 15

achievement.name: Slow Roll
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 1, but not before turn 27

achievement.name: Traitor Annihilator
achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Imperial Traitors 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in opponent's deck

achievement.name: Nest Annihilator
achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Bloodthirsty Nest 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in the opponent's deck

achievement.name: Xeno Annihilator
achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Xeno Invasion 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in the opponent's deck

achievement.name: Honored Vanguard
achievement.desc: Play the cards "Zealot" "Marine" and have "Eva" as your Commander in Mission 10 and win.

achievement.name: Honored Champions
achievement.desc: Play the cards "Impulse Walker" "Exterminator" and "Skycom" in Mission 18 and win.

achievement.name: Honored Shield
achievement.desc: Play the cards "Moloch" "Bolide Walker" and have "Dalia" as your Commander in Mission 28 and win.

achievement.name: Honored Protectorate
achievement.desc: Play the cards "Fortified Extractor" "Sarcous Grub" and "Pyro Rig" in Mission 38 and win.

achievement.name: Honored Outrider
achievement.desc: Play the cards "Ghost" "Massive Assault" and "Pathrazer" in Mission 41 and win.

achievement.name: Nexus Conqueror
achievement.desc: Complete all missions associated with the Nexus set (through Mission 66)

achievement.name: CHARGE!
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission using Crush, Flurry, and Rally

achievement.name: No-Fly Zone
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 58 without any of your units activating a 'Flying' skill

achievement.name: Story Mode - Raider's Unite
achievement.desc: Play at least 5 Raiders (Commander doesn't count) in mission 64 and win

achievement.name: Crushing Victory
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after using Crush 3 times

achievement.name: Can't Touch This
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after using Evade 5 times

achievement.name: Fists of Flurry
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 24 or higher using Flurry 5 times

achievement.name: One-Hit Kill
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 24 or higher playing only 1 Assault card, using Rally 5 times, and only attacking once.

achievement.name: Nexus Heavy Hitters
achievement.desc: Play at least 1 Raider, Imperial, Bloodthirsty, and Xeno (Commander does not count) in Mission 42 or higher and win.

achievement.name: Speedy Sulfuris
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 53 by turn 13

achievement.name: Speedy Odeus
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 59 by turn 11

achievement.name: Speedy Blightlands
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 66 by turn 9

achievement.desc: Play the cards "Assembly Plant" "Vorpal Tank" and "Tactical Infiltrator" in Mission 53 and win.

achievement.name: Honored Purge
achievement.desc: Play the cards "Irradiated Infantry" "Sky Watcher" and "Pummeller" in Mission 66 and win.

achievement.name: Homeland Annihilator
achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Homeland Defenders 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in opponent's deck

achievement.name: Elite Annihilator
achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Halcyon's Elite 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in opponent's deck

achievement.name: Creature Annihilator
achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Creature Combo 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in opponent's deck

achievement.name: Conserving Ammo
achievement.desc: Defeat 10 or more Missions higher than 40, attacking no more than 5 times in each battle

achievement.name: Resilient
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission using Evade, Regenerate, Jam, and Immobilize

achievement.name: Fear the Reaper
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 41 or higher after using Fear 5 times.

achievement.name: True Valor
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher killing at least 10 Assault card while playing no more than 5 Assault cards, and no Actions or Structures

achievement.name: Enfeeblict
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after using Enfeeble 10 times

achievement.name: Come from Behind

achievement.name: Wide Range
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after using Swipe 5 times

achievement.name: Take That!
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after using Payback 5 times

achievement.name: Bloodthirsty Pet
achievement.desc: Defeat a Mission after using Payback, Enfeeble, Swipe, Leech, and Siphon

achievement.name: Against the Odds - 74
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 74 after playing at least 8 Raiders (Commander doesn't count)

achievement.name: Common Theme

achievement.name: Against the Odds - 80
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 80 after playing at least 8 Bloodthirsty (Commander doesn't count)

achievement.name: SMASH!
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher and have at least 1 attack do at least 10 damage

achievement.name: Overkill
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher and deal at least 20 total damage to the enemy Commander

achievement.name: EXTREME Overkill!!!
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 28 or higher and deal at least 25 total damage to the enemy Commander

achievement.name: Common Attacker
achievement.desc: Defeat Mission 67 or higher after playing 8 Common cards (Commander doesn't count) 25 times

achievement.desc: Beat Mission 85 by turn 11

achievement.name: Speedy Core
achievement.desc: Beat Mission 90 by turn 9

achievement.desc: Beat the mission "Displaced Raiders 3" and destroy all Assault cards and Structures in opponent's deck

achievement.name: Rally Free Zone

achievement.name: Tournament Pro
achievement.desc: Enter 100 Tournaments

achievement.name: Good Finish
achievement.desc: Place in the top 10% of a Tournament (min 10 Players)

achievement.name: Great Finish
achievement.desc: Place in the top 5% of a Tournament (min 20 Players)

achievement.name: Excellent Finish!
achievement.desc: Place in the top 1% of a Tournament (min 100 Players)

achievement.name: Freaky Good Finish

achievement.name: Freaky Excellent Finish!
